definition: mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable

sentences.english: In those years, workers lived right on those cliffs.
sentences.chinese: 当年修渠的勇士们就住在那些山崖上。

sentences.english: Big sister Jane follows to push the giant cliffs, hurriedly block.
sentences.chinese: 大妹见天贞要把擎天推下山崖，急忙阻止。

sentences.english: The sky is necked by the two high cliffs.
sentences.chinese: 两座高大山崖使天空变成了一条缝。

sentences.english: HanShan sitting under the cliff edge, night and day, JuShou river.
sentences.chinese: 韩珊坐在山崖下的河水边，昼夜据守。

sentences.english: The flow of melted snow cascaded down the mountainside and into the river.
sentences.chinese: 消溶的雪水如瀑布般沿着山崖边泻入河里。

sentences.english: It just hung over the cliff.
sentences.chinese: 它正好悬挂在山崖上方。

sentences.english: Kratos traverses the mountain cliffs and makes his way to Typhon's Cavern.
sentences.chinese: 奎托斯沿着山崖进入了提丰所在的洞穴。

sentences.english: Danxia Landforms consist of red sedimentary rock and steep cliffs.
sentences.chinese: 丹霞下由玄色的重积岩和峻峭的山崖构成。

sentences.english: And he was a stone, high up on the mountain-side.
sentences.chinese: 然后他变成了高高山崖上的一块石头。

sentences.english: “It was like dropping it over a cliff, ” she said.
sentences.chinese: “这感觉就像从山崖边掉了下去，”戈登说道。

sentences.english: Do you want to know more about the livelihoods of Yakou Village?
sentences.chinese: 你想了解中山崖口村人民独特的生产生活方式吗？

sentences.english: The flow of melted snow cascaded down mountainside and into the river.
sentences.chinese: 容话蹬雪水如琴布般沿着山崖边泻呻河里。

definition: halfway up a mountain/lit. waist of mountain
sheer cliffs and precipitous rock faces (idiom)
